title: LARGE 1 BEDROOM W/GUEST BEDROOM IN MIDTOWN
posting_body: ['REMODELED FRESH & CLEAN 1,000 SQ FT APARTMENT', 'WITH HARDWOOD FLOORS & TILE.', 'FOR ADDITIONAL INFO CALL', 'WREFORD JOHNSON @', 'show contact info', '(PHONE CALLS ONLY)', 'I DO NOT RESPOND TO E-MAILS', '$800 SEC/DAMAGE DEPOSIT FOR NON-SMOKERS', '*********NOTICE*********DUE TO LIMITED PARKING WE CAN ONLY RENT THIS APARTMENT TO ONE PERSON WITH ONE VEHICLE.', 'PLEASE DO NOT BOTHER CALLING IF THERE IS MORE THAN ONE PERSON.**********************************NO', 'DOGS ALLOWED*****************MARIJUANA SMOKING OR DRUG USE IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED ON ALL OF MY PROPERTIES, SO IF YOU PLAN TO DO EITHER, YOU NEED TO RENT FROM SOMEONE ELSE WHO ALLOWS THIS.', 'AVAILABLE JULY15,2022', '1ST FLOOR', 'AMMENITIES INCLUDE***', 'PERFECT LOCATION IN MIDTOWN & 5 MIN.', 'TO DOWNTOWN', "HARDWOOD FLOORS & 9 1/2' CEILINGS", 'CENTRAL HEAT & AIR', 'NEW WINDOWS & NEW BLINDS', 'CEILING FANS THROUGHOUT', 'LOTS OF LARGE CLOSET SPACE', 'VERY SAFE, WELL LIT, NICE & QUIET WITH ADULT NEIGHBORS', 'FREE LAUNDRY FACILITY RIGHT OUT BACK DOOR', 'WOOD DECK', 'YOUR OWN PARKING SPACE', 'SEPARATE DINING ROOM WITH BREAKFAST BAR', 'BONUS ROOM GREAT FOR OFFICE OR GUEST BEDROOM', 'FRESH PAINT TOP TO BOTTOM', 'CLEANEST APARTMENT IN MIDTOWN']
